Package org.microbean.configuration.spi

Provides classes and interfaces for service providers for the MicroBean Configuration framework.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Arbiter
    A resolver of ambiguous ConfigurationValues.
    Configuration
    An accessor of ConfigurationValues in configuration space.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConfiguration
    A skeletal implementation of the Configuration interface.
    ComparatorBasedArbiter<T>
    An abstract Arbiter that uses a Comparator in some way.
    ConfigurationCoordinates
    An AbstractConfiguration conceptually housing only the configuration property that returns a Map-convertible String representing configuration coordinates for the calling application.
    ConfigurationValueSourceComparingArbiter
    A ComparatorBasedArbiter that compares ConfigurationValues by their sources.
    Converter<T>
    A TypeLiteral that can convert String values into another kind of Object.
    EnvironmentVariablesConfiguration
    An AbstractConfiguration providing access to environment variabes.
    RankedComparator<T>
    A Comparator that uses a List of Objects to rank other objects for comparison purposes.
    SystemPropertiesConfiguration
    An AbstractConfiguration that houses System properties and hence, by definition, minimally specific ConfigurationValues representing them.
    SystemPropertiesOutrankEnvironmentVariablesArbiter
    A ConfigurationValueSourceComparingArbiter that ranks system properties over environment variables.

Package org.microbean.configuration.spi Description

Provides classes and interfaces for service providers for the MicroBean Configuration framework.
Author:
Laird Nelson
See Also:
Arbiter, Configuration, Converter
